Class PlantUMLImageGenerator

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

extends java.lang.Object
implements IClassDiagramImageGenerator
    Class which reads Class Diagram data and generate Image using PlantUML.

      • generateImage

        public org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Image generateImage​(ClassDiagram classDiagram)
        Generates image from class diagram. New PlantUML source code is generated. The developer is responsible for disposing the generated image.
        Parameters:
        classDiagram - from which is generated image
        Returns:
        generated Image

      • generateImageFromSourceString

        public org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Image generateImageFromSourceString​(java.lang.String plantUMLSource)
        Generates image from plantUMLSource code. The developer is responsible for disposing the generated image.
        Parameters:
        plantUMLSource - from which is generated image
        Returns:
        generated Image

      • getPlantUMLSource

        private java.lang.String getPlantUMLSource​(ClassDiagram classDiagram)
        Gets PlantUML source code which will be used for generating image from it. See https://plantuml.com/class-diagram for more about PlantUML class diagram syntax.
        Parameters:
        classDiagram - from which is PlantUML text generated
        Returns:
        PlantUML text

      • addClassToPlantUML

        private void addClassToPlantUML​(java.lang.StringBuilder source,
                                java.lang.StringBuilder relationshipsString,
                                ClassModel classModel)
        Adds class model to source and relationships in this class to relationshipsString.
        Parameters:
        source - PlantUML code
        relationshipsString - string of relationships in the whole class diagram
        classModel - to be added to PlantUML source

      • addRelationships

        private void addRelationships​(java.lang.StringBuilder source,
                              java.lang.StringBuilder relationshipsString,
                              ClassModel classModel)
        Adds relationships of class model to the source of PlantUML code.
        Parameters:
        source - PlantUML code
        relationshipsString - - string with relationships
        classModel - one class
